verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H3372>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in His <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H3018>fruit<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands,<s%> You will be <S%H835>happy<s%> and it will be <S%H2895>well<s%> with you.

Your <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be like a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%> <S%H3411>Within<s%> your <S%H1004>house,<s%> Your <S%H1121>children<s%> like <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8363>plants<s%> <S%H5439>Around<s%> your <S%H7979>table.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> for <S%H3651>thus<s%> shall the <S%H1397>man<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> Who <S%H3372>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> And may you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2898>prosperity<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H9132>life.<s%>
Indeed, may you <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%>'s children. <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be upon <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>
